::Shadow Wing::

She smlied when she knew he was alright. "How are you feeling? Yes 
there was an explosion, but all is calm now." She took a quick over 
look of him to make sure he was all healed.  "Glowing sight huh? me? 
yeah I'll be glowing alright, as soon as you tell me what really 
happened out there.  You looked like you faught an entire platoon of 
preds.  What happened?"
She turned and took a few steps away, turned and looked at him.
"Blast, I was worried sick. No messages, no communication at all, I 
was about to fly the globe looking for you. THank the Matrix your 
alright. But what happened?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
>   Lunarpine awoke, the sedative wearing off, his first sight was 
> Shadow Wing looking in on him. "What happened Wing," he asked "What 
> was that explosion?" He stared at her a moment, she seemed to have 
an 
> almost angelic glow around her.
> 
> "I must be functional there wouldn't be such a glowing sight in the 
> Pit." Shadow Wing no longer looked angry at him, just concerned.
>
